title: Free Tier with Enhanced Premium Features
description: With this newest update, we are proud to announce the addition of a free tier. You can now use this app and plan a trip for free!
We've also added more premium tiers so you can better select what you need! We've also updated the app to support iOS 26 and a dark mode.

title: Apple Maps Support
description: Added the option to open the route in Apple Maps.
Various UI/UX enhancements and bug fixes that will allow for a much better user experience.

title: Premium Features and Trip History
description: Planning a trip and want to quickly access that trip information at a later date? You can now do that with our new History feature that allows you to select a trip you searched for previously.
We added a new profile screen that will show your favorite destination along with other account information.
We have a new premium tier for all of you In The Clear power users!
I also squashed just enough bugs for me to list "bug fixes" in the release notes.

title: Profile Features
description: We have a new authentication page. This will allow you to get an ad-free experience on the web app, and more soon to be released features!
(Deprecated) I'm proud to announce that In The Clear now has a web app! It has all the features of the iOS app, and best of all, it's at no extra cost.
I also squashed just enough bugs for me to list "bug fixes" in the release notes.
